/** ------------------------------------------------------------------------ File : IConditionResolver Purpose : InjectABL condition resolution interface. Syntax : Description : @author pjudge Created : Wed Mar 10 13:19:00 EST 2010 Notes : * Not all conditions resolve as simply as X:Equals(Y); for example, the session type resolves may depend on whether there are AppServers or DBs connected to determine the validity of a clause. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
